paper_abstract: Many previous papers have presented generalizations of the principle of inclusion and exclusion to fuzzy sets or IF-sets (Atanassov's intuitionistic fuzzy sets) with Godel or product operations. We clarify for which fuzzy intersections and unions, based on continuous triangular norms and conorms, the principle of inclusion and exclusion holds. (C) 2013 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Principles of inclusion and exclusion for fuzzy sets
